name: seeds_centered_model
title: Random Effect Logistic Regression for Seed Germination Proportion
description:
The model is essentially a random effects logistic,
          allowing for over-dispersion. Models the proportion of germination
          of different seeds in different root extracts. 'Stanified' & centered:
          tau replaced by sigma, direct estimation using 
          narrower semi-informative priors, coefficients are centered
